trivia.name: Test your art knowledge
trivia.q1: Painter Piet Mondrian (1872 - 1944) was a part of what movement?
trivia.q2: Which time signature is commonly known as “Cut Time?”
trivia.q4: What French sculptor designed the Statue of Liberty?
trivia.q5: What nationality was the surrealist painter Salvador Dali?
trivia.q6: Albrecht Dürer's birthplace and place of death were in...
trivia.q7: What year did Albrecht Dürer create the painting "The Young Hare"?
trivia.q8: What year was the Mona Lisa finished?
trivia.q9: Who painted "Swans Reflecting Elephants", "Sleep", and "The Persistence of Memory"?
trivia.q10: Which of these are the name of a famous marker brand?
trivia.q11: Which artist's style was to use small different colored dots to create a picture?
trivia.q12: How many paint and pastel versions of "The Scream" is Norwegian painter Edvard Munch believed to have produced?
results: You are an art novice. You appreciate the artwork and not necessarliy the history of the work.
You are an art enthusiast. You are admirer of art but not an art history buff.
Bravo, you are an art aficionado! You are an art scholar and appreciate art history.

trivia.name: Are you a movie buff?
trivia.q1: In which 1973 film does Yul Brynner play a robotic cowboy who malfunctions and goes on a killing spree?
trivia.q2: In which 1955 film does Frank Sinatra play Nathan Detroit?
trivia.q3: What is the name of the robot in the 1951 science fiction film classic 'The Day the Earth Stood Still'?
trivia.q4: Who played Batman in the 1997 film "Batman and Robin"?
trivia.q5: This movie contains the quote, "What we've got here is a failure to communicate."
a5: In the Heat of the Night
trivia.q6: In which African country was the 2006 film 'Blood Diamond' mostly set in?
trivia.q7: In what year was the movie "Police Academy" released?
trivia.q8: In The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring, which one of the following characters from the book was left out of the film?
trivia.q9: Who is the director of the 1991 film "Silence of the Lambs"?
trivia.q10: Mark Wahlberg played the titular character of which 2008 video-game adaptation?
results: You like watching movies to help you fall asleep.
You like watching movies but have seen too many movies to remember all the details of the movie.
You are a movie aficionado! You have spent hours of your life watching movies and indulging in every detail of the film.
